summary: Modern adaptation of Charles Dickens' Great Expectations; a poor but talented boy falls in love with a girl from an affluent family.
cast: Aditya Roy Kapoor|Katrina Kaif|Tabu|Rahul Bhatt|Lara Dutta|Delbar Arya|Ajay Devgn|Shahid Gulfam|Aditi Rao Hydari|Khalida Jan|Mateusz Kaczan|Jakub Karys|Kunaal Kyhaan|Beata Migas|Namit|Akshay Oberoi|Pawel Olearczyk|Suchitra Pillai|Jason Shah|Tunisha Sharma|Mohammad Abrar Sheikh|Teena Singh|Andy von Eich|Suzanna Zajac|Ranjit Batra
title: Fitoor
